sections.MISSION: TF Trident conducts PLT LFXs on RG 118 IOT progress UAF combined arms maneuver across echelons.
sections.PURPOSE: this operation is to enable UAF to build capability through combined arms maneuver in preparation for Company CALFEX.
sections.KEY TASKS:
Execute deliberate Troop Leading Procedures.
Safe and efficient
sections.EXECUTION: of PLT LFX. Attack to Seize a trench. Transition to the Defense
sections.END STATE:
UAF BTGs are prepared to execute combined arms maneuver and postured to conduct Company CALFEX in preparation for Force on Force.
